trends: There has been one other sighting in Willow River
There were no other sightings in Willow River on or around July 4th 2013
divs: sighting detailson 7\4\2013 when we came outide after dark we saw the orbs hovering in the tree and by the tree. the next day we found scourched leaves on the tree. it is very common for us to see the orbs, they come in all different colors. some come close and some keep their distance. the dog will bark at the orbs and act aggresively toward them. we get a lot of orbs in the house as well. one morning, i found an orb hovering by the side of my bed, when i got up, it moved to the rear of the bed. we see ufo's often as well, when we use the night vision goggles. we have alot of paranormal activity as well.
Summary: We came outside after dark and saw the orbs hovering there.
